title: Windows 11 build 22567 makes Windows Update more sustainable
content:
It’s Wednesday, which means it’s time for Microsoft to release another build of Windows 11 for Windows Insiders in the Dev channel. This week, we’re getting Windows 11 build 22567, and it comes with a handful if improvements, though arguably not as big as we’ve seen in the past couple of weeks. One of the

The post Windows 11 build 22567 makes Windows Update more sustainable appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Windows 11 build 22567 is now heading out to Windows Insiders, and it includes some new sustainability features and minor changes.
